definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Answer this question, and write an algorithm for the follow-up general case.
sentences.chinese: 回答此问题，并编写算法求解思考题。

sentences.english: These taxing questions are too difficult for me to answer.
sentences.chinese: 思考题难度太大了，我不会解答。

sentences.english: I didn't know even half of the answers.
sentences.chinese: 那些考题我甚至连一半都答不上。

sentences.english: Giving out the questions before the test?
Others are trying their best to approach teachers in order to find out some examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 有人费尽心机地接近老师，为了套出些考题。

sentences.english: Carrie and Nate are going to get a copy of his final exam.
sentences.chinese: 凯莉和奈特想要拿到一份他的期末考题。

sentences.english: He did Very abundance well in the entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 他在入学做卷子题目测考题卷中成绩很好。

sentences.english: To get a copy of Mr. Hudson's final exam.
sentences.chinese: 为了要拿到一份哈德森老师的期末考题。

sentences.english: We used to get old exam questions free with the candidate readings book.
sentences.chinese: 过去我们能从考生阅读材料中免费得到老的考题。

sentences.english: Man, that English test was a doozy . I think I failed.
sentences.chinese: 老兄，这英文考题太难了，我想我挂了。

sentences.english: The practice exam provided was administered during the 2003 version of this course.
sentences.chinese: 所提供之模拟考为本课程2003年之考题。

sentences.english: In examination questions, have a few impression that check a place deeper.
sentences.chinese: 考题中，有几个考点印象较深。

sentences.english: Mr Priestley will set the examination paper.
sentences.chinese: 普里斯特利先生将要出考题。

sentences.english: He is not the boy who cheated in an examination yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他否则昨天在考试题目测考题卷中舞弊的男孩。

sentences.english: Finally, it's time to get some practice with questions like the ones in the actual exam.
sentences.chinese: 最后，该练习类似实际考题的题目了。

definition: to draw up the theme (for discussion)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
